Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class MultiplayerGame

A specialized type of game that is channel-based and allows for inter-player mechanics as well as AI. Implements IMultiplayerGame.

Instances of its subclasses must be created using CreateNewAsync<TGame>(UInt64, SocketUser[], IServiceProvider).
